docs.title: AscendCSharp30
docs.text:
A 30-day, hands-on path to modern C# and .NET — daily focused practice and small projects.

Ready to start? Jump to Day 1:

Start Day 1 — Setup & Tooling

This site mirrors the repository and provides quick links to each day's starter content. For full repository content including complete solutions, see the GitHub repository.

docs.title: Quickstart
docs.text:
Clone the repo and open Day 1 starter:

git clone https://github.com/OakesekAo/AscendCSharp30.git
cd AscendCSharp30
# open Day 1 starter README
code days/Day01-Setup-And-Tooling/Day01-Starter/README.md

Day 1 covers environment setup and tooling. Follow the step-by-step instructions in the Day 1 starter README.
